typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcoltp
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> lkpsrcolap
srcoltp select(mapColumn(
		src_id = id,
		src_name = name,
		src_age = age,
		src_address = address,
		src_phone = phone
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
rename derive(src_dwhash = sha2(256,src_age+src_phone)) ~> createsrchash
createsrchash, lkpsrcolap lookup(src_id == id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lkptgtolap
lkptgtolap select(mapColumn(
		src_id,
		src_name,
		src_age,
		src_address,
		src_phone,
		src_dwhash,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectrequired
selectrequired split(iif(isNull(id),true(),false()),
	disjoint: false) ~> newvsold@(newrecords, oldrecords)
newvsold@newrecords derive(src_inserted = currentTimestamp(),
		src_updated = currentTimestamp()) ~> auditcolumns
newvsold@oldrecords, lkptgtolap exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> issrcchanged
issrcchanged derive(src_updated = currentTimestamp()) ~> updauditcolumns
updauditcolumns alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
auditcolumns sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id = src_id,
		name = src_name,
		age = src_age,
		address = src_address,
		phone = src_phone,
		{_Inserted} = src_inserted,
		{_LastUpdated} = src_updated,
		DWHash = src_dwhash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtolapinsert
AlterRow sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name = src_name,
		age = src_age,
		address = src_address,
		phone = src_phone,
		{_LastUpdated} = src_updated,
		DWHash = src_dwhash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> tgtolapupdate
